DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether inclusion of almonds in a weight loss regimen will augment the rate of weight loss, promote a greater fat mass/fat-free mass ratio of weight loss, improve blood pressure and ameliorate the post-lunch dip in cognitive function.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Including Almonds in a Weight Loss Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine whether inclusion of almonds in a weight loss regimen will augment the rate of weight loss, promote a greater fat mass/fat-free mass ratio of weight loss, improve blood pressure and ameliorate the post-lunch dip in cognitive function.
DOC.criteria: Adult participants Overweight or obese (BMI 2540 kg/m2) Fasting blood glucose â‰¤6.9 mmol/L via capillary fingerstick blood samples No nut allergies Willing to comply to study protocol and to eat test meals Those not meeting inclusion criteria.
